scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:ui: npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/notebooks && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/notebooks" "npm run start -w notebooks-app"
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=warn hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ./apps/launcher/workdir/notebooks.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a notebooks network mdns
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.package:ui: npm run build:ui && cd ui/dist && bestzip ../dist.zip *
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./apps/launcher/dnas/notebooks && hc dna pack ./apps/launcher/dnas/syn
